GetStyle
TextStyle GetStyle(
const std::string &tag
) const

Get the style bound to the tag name, if not found, it returns a <TextStyle> with default values.

Parameters
tag
const std::string&

The tag name to search for

Returns

A text style, use HasStyle to see if a style exists

See Also

<TextStyle>
